ability.desc: Drag this Tome to the Shop to open an Armory full of emblems! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of completed items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of component items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Artifact items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Support items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
This chest stores all of the accumulated loot you've collected. Win a combat against a player to open it!

Heal @TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) and deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the current target. Healing and damage are increased by up to @AmountIncreaseMax*100@% based on Aatrox's missing health.

Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target, increased up to @MaxDamageAmp*100@% based on the target's missing health.

If the target dies, deal @OverkillPercent*100@% of overkill damage split between the @OverkillTargetSpreadCount@ closest enemies, plus @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per target.

Mark the farthest unmarked target within @HexSearchRange@ hexes, then dash through all marked enemies in order. Each dash deals @Total_Strike_Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to its target and @Total_Dash_Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to other enemies hit.

If only one enemy remains, dash @SingleEnemyDashes@ times instead

The next @AttackCount@ attacks fire bonus arrows dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleAS%)</physicalDamage> total physical damage split between the target and up to two random enemies within 2 hexes.

Stun the target and spin them around for @Duration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) to other enemies in a @Radius_INSCRIPT_FORTOOLTIPONLY@-hex radius.

Then throw the target forward, dealing @ModifiedThrowDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) in a 1-hex area around the target. If the target drops below @ExecuteThreshold@ (%i:scaleAP%) health, throw them off the board instead.

Fire a bullet at the farthest enemy, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the first target hit. The bullet bounces to a nearby enemy, dealing @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Caitlyn_FullPotential_TRA@

Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>, then deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target, increased by <TFTBonus>@TankDamageIncrease*100@%</TFTBonus> against <TFTKeyword>Tanks</TFTKeyword>. If the target dies, immediately recast dealing <scaleLevel>@PercentDamageFalloff*100@%</scaleLevel> damage.

Fire a blast at the current target, dealing @ModifiedAPDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @ModifiedADDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Ezreal_FullPotential_TRA@

Heal @TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) and deal @AdditionalDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Garen_FullPotential_TRA@

Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedConeDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, and @ModifiedConeSplitDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between enemies in a cone. Every 3rd cast is Rip the Threads.

Soul Stitch: Fire @NeedleCount@ needles through the board, dealing @ModifiedNeedleDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit and leaving threads behind.

Rip The Threads: Deal @ModifiedDividedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) split between all enemies and @ModifiedBurstDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage to each. Enemies near at least one thread take @ThreadIncrease*100@% more damage.

Grant <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAllyShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> shield to the @NumShields@ lowest Health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and fire @NumButterflies@ butterflies dealing <magicDamage>@DamageTotal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage split between the @SpellRangeInEnemies@ closest enemies.

Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, then slam into a group of enemies, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within a @HexRadius@ hex radius and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.

Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Jayce_FullPotential_TRA@

<spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Attack Speed is always <scaleLevel>@AttackSpeed@</scaleLevel>. Convert 1% bonus Attack Speed into 0.8% Attack Damage. Every fourth attack is enhanced to deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

Passive: Attacks grant @ModifiedASPerStack@% (%i:scaleAP%) stacking Attack Speed, up to @ModifiedMaxAS@% (%i:scaleAP%). Critical strikes instead grant @ASPerCrit@% (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and @ModifiedRocketAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage split across a @BigRocketRadius@-hex radius centered on the target.

Passive (ALL OUT): On first death instead heal to full, gain @FlatASBuff*100@% Attack Speed, convert @DefenseLossRatio*100@% of Armor and Magic Resist into Attack Damage, and set max mana to @FighterMaxMana@. Then dash through the target and briefly Stun them. While ALL OUT, lose @AllOutPercentHealthDecay*100@% Health each second and heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%) on kill.

Active: Gain @ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%) Durability for @Duration@ seconds, then deal @ModifiedTankDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) physical damage to the target.

Active (ALL OUT): . Deal @ModifiedFighterDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

Passive: Kills grant @ADPerKill@% permanent Attack Damage (+@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_KaiSaSpell_PermanentAD@% %i:scaleAD%).

Active: Fire 8 missiles divided between the target and nearby enemies. Each missile deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Hurl a spear at the farthest enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy hit. If the enemy dies the spear continues, dealing overkill damage to the next enemy hit.

Blink to the enemy with the lowest health within 2 hexes and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Katarina_FullPotential_TRA@

Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage. Gain additional power based on your Tactician level.

Level @FirstAscensionLevel@: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals @AscensionModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @ShredAmount@% Shreds enemies for @ShredDuration@ seconds.
Level @SecondAscensionLevel@: Every attack launches a wave. Waves travel farther.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

Heal <scaleHealth>@TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>, then deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the 2 nearest enemies and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

Gain <TFTBonus>@TotalShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. The next attack deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%)</physicalDamage> bonus physical damage and <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> for @StunDuration@ seconds.
Field Lee Sin to choose a stance. Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin a bonus trait.

Shield for @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) for @Duration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Leona_FullPotential_TRA@
Field Lulu to choose a monster to train! Each monster has unique abilities.

Fire an energy ball towards the largest group of enemies containing the target. On arrival, 20% Shred enemies in a 1-hex radius for @ShredDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between them plus @ModifiedBaseDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to each.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

Passive: Gain @BonusResists@ Armor for each item equipped.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies in a cone.

Infect the closest @SpreadTargets@ uninfected targets, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over @Duration@ seconds. If an infected target dies, the infection spreads to the nearest uninfected target for any remaining time.

If all enemies are infected, this effect can stack.
Gain <TFTBonus>@FinalShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, then deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target.

Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. When it breaks, deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage>  physical damage to the target and <physicalDamage>@SecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to other enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. The target is <TFTKeyword>Stunned</TFTKeyword> for <TFTBonus>@StunDuration@-@MaxStunDuration@</TFTBonus> seconds based on how long the shield held, and other enemies are briefly <TFTKeyword>Stunned</TFTKeyword>.

Heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the @NumTargets@ closest enemies.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Rakan_FullPotential_TRA@

Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a short line through the target, then reduce damage taken by <magicDamage>@ModifiedFlatDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> for @BuffDuration@ seconds.

Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target over <scaleLevel>@Duration@</scaleLevel> seconds. Enemies in a 1-hex radius around the target take <magicDamage>@ModifiedAdditionalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> over the same duration.

Passive: After casting, gain 1 Style and @VampBonus*100%@% Omnivamp, up of 4 stacks. At max stacks, the next cast is Inner Arsenal Unleashed.

Soul Shot: Deal @ModifiedQBulletDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and dash a short distance.

Inner Arsenal Unleashed: Double the passive bonus and leap to a nearby group of enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) to all enemies in a @HexRange@-hex radius. Reset your Style to 0.

Passive: Ultimate Friendship Bomb's damage scales on Power of Friendship, which is based on all of your team's bonus stats (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%%i:scaleAS%%i:scaleCrit%%i:scaleCritMult%%i:scaleHealth%). Stats on Seraphine contribute more.

Active: Fire a friendship bomb towards the largest group of enemies within @ModifiedCastRange@ (%i:scaleRange%) hexes, dealing @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Seraphine_PowerOfFriendship@ (Power of Friendship) magic damage in a @SpellRadius@-hex radius.

Over a short duration, heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) and deal @ModifiedFlurryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

Then, deal @ModifiedConeDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a cone. Enemies in the center line take @ModifiedTrueDamage@ more physical damage, increased based on healing received this combat.

Gain @ModifiedInitialHealth@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) max Health, then deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage every second to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Subsequent casts heal @ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) and increase the damage by @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%).
Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and reduces their Magic Resist by <scaleLevel>@MRReduction@</scaleLevel>.

Make @NumAttacks@ rapid attacks. Each heals Udyr for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> additional damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

Passive: Gain mana when units die. Enemies grant @EnemySoulMana@, allies @AllySoulMana@.

Active: Fire @ModifiedArrowsPerSecond@ (%i:scaleAS%) piercing arrows per second at random enemies until Varus is out of mana. Each arrow costs @ManaPerArrow@ mana and deals @TotalArrowDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage, reduced by @ReducedDamagePerTargetHit*100@% per hit.

Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedPassiveDamage@ (%i:TFTBaseAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Active: The next three attacks unleash a devastating combo.

Pommel Bash: Deal @ModifiedComboDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
Rising Slash: Deal @ModifiedComboDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and briefly Stun the target.
Falling Slash: Deal @ModifiedFinalComboDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Gain <TFTBonus>@FinalAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> attack speed for @AttackNum@ attacks. These attacks deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> bonus physical damage to the target and @AdditionalTargets@ nearby enemies

Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>, deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius, and mark the current target. For @Duration@ seconds, take <scaleLevel>@DamageReduction@%</scaleLevel> reduced damage from unmarked enemies.
Deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the @NumTargets@ closest enemies.

Passive: Attacks grant @ASperAttack*100@% stacking Attack Speed and Movement Speed, and alternate between dealing @ModifiedAttackTrueDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus true damage and @ModifiedAttackMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Send an echo towards the two furthest enemies, dealing @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and briefly Stunning enemies hit.

Launch @ModifiedNumPages@ pages dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each, split between the target and enemies within 2 hexes. Each subsequent cast launches @BaseAdditionalPages@ more pages.

Potential (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_CurrentPotential@%i:set14AmpIcon%): @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_BattleAcademia_Yuumi_FullPotential_TRA@
Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and deal <magicDamage>@FinalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within a 1-hex radius.

Passive: Attacks are bouncing bombs that deal @TotalAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:TFTBaseAD%) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal @ModifiedExplosionDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

Passive: Every @AttacksToSlam@th attack deals @SlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. When changing targets, immediately slam for @TargetChangePercent*100@% damage.

Active: For @Duration@ seconds gain @ModifiedAttackSpeed@ Attack Speed, @ModifiedOmnivamp@% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.

Passive: Gain @APPerLevel@ %i:scaleAP% per Monster Trainer level (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_KogMawAP@ %i:scaleAP%). Attacks deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: The next attack deals @ModifiedExtraProjectileDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage to the target and the @BounceNum@ closest enemies, then 30% Shred and Sunder them for @Duration@ seconds.

Level 15: On-cast, gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Level 30: Gain infinite range and increase Attack Speed bonuses by @MultiplicativeASBonus*100@%. Max Attack Speed is now @LevelUpASCap@.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor

Passive: Gain @ADPerLevel*100@% %i:scaleAD% per Monster Trainer level (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_SmolderAS*100@% %i:scaleAD%). Damage Burns and Wounds for @PassiveDuration@ seconds.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target, and @ModifiedEmberDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the 3 nearest targets.

Level 15: Every @CastsPerBonus@ casts, fire a second blast at the next closest enemy, dealing @SecondcastDamage*100@% damage.

Level 30: Ignore @ArmorIgnore*100@% of the target's Armor. Reduce max mana by @LevelUpManaReduction@.

{{TFT_Keyword_Burn}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Wound}}

Over 1 second, deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage in a line through the current target. Enemies after the first take @SecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) instead.

When no targets are left, regain mana based on the time remaining.

Fire @NumShots@ shots towards the target. Each deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the first enemy hit. For each miss, restore <scaleMana>@ManaPerMiss@</scaleMana> mana.

Deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the lowest health enemy within @ModifiedCastRange@ hexes. If the target dies, @ModifiedGoldChance@% %i:scaleAP% chance to gain 1 gold.

Gold Earned: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_GangplankSpell_GoldCount@

Passive: Every @PassiveCadence@ seconds the next attack deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%) bonus physical damage.

Active: Gain @TotalHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) maximum health over @Duration@ seconds and immediately trigger the passive.

Passive: Gain @ModifiedASPerStack@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed for each attack against the same target, up to @MaxAS@ (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: For @SpellDuration@ seconds, gain @GnarAD*100@% Attack Damage and grant two nearby allies @AllyAD*100@% Attack Damage, prioritizing Attack champions.
Fire an energy disc that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> total magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

Passive: Gain @ArmorPerComponent@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% for each component equipped to your team.

Active: Heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%), deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target, and @ArmorShredPercent*100@% Sunder enemies hit for @ArmorShredDuration@ seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
Gain @ModifiedCoreEnergyShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedSpell1Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target.

Launch a returning blade 2-hexes through the current target. It deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies hit, reduced by @FalloffPercent*100@% per hit.

Passive: Attacks bounce between @AttackNumEnemies@ enemies, dealing @ModifiedPassiveDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage and marking enemies hit. Attacks deal @MultAttackDamageReduction*100@% reduced damage per hit.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the @SpellNumEnemies@ closest enemies, and detonate their marks for @ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each.
Shield <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> for @Duration@ seconds. The next @AttackCount@ attacks deal <trueDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage.

Passive: Gain @TrainerResists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% per Monster Trainer level (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT15_MonsterTrainer_RammusResists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%).

Active: Gain @TotalShieldValue@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. When it breaks, deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) magic damage to the nearest 3 enemies and Stun them for @StunDuration@ second.

Level 15: On cast, leap to the largest group within 2 hexes and Taunt enemies. Gain @ModifiedLeapHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%) max Health per enemy Taunted.

Level 30: Gain an additional @TrainerResists@ %i:scaleArmor% Armor and %i:scaleMR% Magic Resist per Trainer level. Increase the Stun to @IncreasedStunDuration@ seconds.

Summon @NumPlants@ untargetable Thornspitters that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) per attack and attack @SummonAttacks@ times.

Non-plant allies gain @ModifiedAS@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed decaying over @ASDuration@ seconds.
Attacks deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
Attacks deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.

Gain <scaleLevel>@DR*100@%</scaleLevel> Durability and heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over @BuffDuration@ seconds, then deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Ekko was pulled from another universe by the Isekai augment.

Freeze all units while attacking the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies @NumAttacks@ total times. Each attack deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage,
-Jinx
Slam the target dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
<spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Occasionally dash around the board.
The Training Dummy cannot move or attack. It is also dressed like a devilishly handsome Yordle.
This chest stores all of the accumulated loot you've collected. Win a combat against a player to open it!
